title: Tier 6: Qt6 and Pre-KDE Dependencies
description: Qt6, extra-cmake-modules, Boost, OpenCV, qca, phonon, etc. (~30 packages)

title: Build sudo 1.9.17p2
description: Privilege escalation for build scripts.

title: Build desktop-file-utils-0.28
description: Desktop file utilities for desktop integration - recommended for VLC

title: Build Phonon-4.12.0
description: KDE multimedia API framework. Required: CMake, extra-cmake-modules, glib2, Qt6. Optional: PulseAudio (already installed)

title: Build extra-cmake-modules-6.17.0
description: Extra CMake modules for KDE Frameworks. Required: CMake. Recommended: Qt6

title: Build Qca-2.3.10
description: Qt Crypto API - cryptographic functions for Qt applications. Required: make-ca, CMake, Qt6, which

title: Build libmng-2.0.3
description: Multiple-image Network Graphics library - recommended for Qt6. Requires libjpeg-turbo and lcms2

title: Build libgpg-error 1.55
description: Required by libgcrypt

title: Tier 7: KDE Frameworks 6.17.0
description: Build all 70 KDE Frameworks packages in order

title: Build pciutils-3.14.0
description: PCI utilities - required for QtWebEngine

title: Build VLC-3.0.21
description: VLC media player - required for Phonon backend. Recommended: alsa-lib, desktop-file-utils, ffmpeg, liba52, libgcrypt, libmad, Lua, graphical environment. Many optional codec/input plugins available.

title: Build liba52-0.8.0
description: ATSC A/52 stream decoder - recommended for VLC

title: Xorg Fonts (9 packages: font-util, encodings, etc.)
description: Requires mkfontscale from Xorg Applications

title: Tier 10: Display Manager (SDDM)
description: Install SDDM for graphical login

title: Fix Vala build with proper deps
Tier 4: Multimedia Libraries
description: ALSA, PulseAudio, PipeWire, FFmpeg, GStreamer, etc. (~20 packages)

title: Build jasper-4.2.8
description: JPEG-2000 codec library - recommended for Qt6

title: Build html5lib (Python module)
description: HTML5 parsing library for Python - required for QtWebEngine

title: Tier 3: Graphics Foundation (X11/Wayland)
description: Mesa, Xorg, Wayland, libdrm, Vulkan, etc. (~25 packages)

title: Tier 2: Networking & Protocols
description: libnl, libpcap, Wget, cURL, Avahi, NetworkManager, ModemManager (~10 packages)

title: Tier 9: KDE Plasma 6.4.4
description: Build all 56 Plasma packages in order

title: Build Polkit-Qt-0.200.0
description: Qt bindings for PolicyKit. Required: CMake, Polkit (already installed), Qt6

title: Build plasma-wayland-protocols-1.18.0
description: Custom Wayland protocol definitions for KDE Plasma. Required: extra-cmake-modules

title: Tier 5: GTK Stack
description: GLib, cairo, Pango, GTK3 (~8 packages)

title: libxkbcommon-1.11.0
description: Build libxkbcommon-1.11.0 (required by GTK and Wayland). Download: https://xkbcommon.org/download/libxkbcommon-1.11.0.tar.xz. Required dependencies: Xorg Libraries, wayland, wayland-protocols (all installed). Build with meson.

title: Build Cups-2.4.12
description: Common UNIX Printing System - required for QtWebEngine, recommended for Qt6

title: Build libwebp-1.6.0
description: WebP image format library - recommended for Qt6 and QtWebEngine

title: Build QtWebEngine-6.9.2
description: Chromium-based web engine for Qt6 (OPTIONAL but useful for web apps). VERY LARGE BUILD (~641MB download, 9.9GB disk, 40 SBU). Required: Cups, html5lib, nodejs, nss, pciutils, Qt6. Recommended: alsa-lib/pulseaudio, ffmpeg, ICU, libevent, libwebp, libxslt, opus, pipewire

title: Build qcoro-0.12.0
description: C++20 coroutines for Qt6. Required: Qt6

title: Build double-conversion-3.3.1
description: Binary-to-decimal conversion library - recommended for Qt6

title: Build KDE Plasma 6.4.4 Desktop Environment
description: Complete build of KDE Plasma desktop for Rookery OS. See KDE-PLASMA-BUILD-ORDER.md for full dependency chain.

title: xcursor-themes-1.0.7 (redglass, whiteglass)
description: Requires xcursorgen from Xorg Applications

title: Build Linux-PAM 1.7.1
description: Foundation for authentication. Required by Shadow, polkit, and many other packages.

title: Build Qt-6.9.2
description: Qt6 cross-platform application framework - foundation for KDE Plasma. LARGE BUILD (~1GB download, 47GB disk space, 15 SBU). Requires: Xorg Libraries. Recommended: alsa-lib, make-ca, cups, double-conversion, glib2, gst-plugins-base, harfbuzz, ICU, jasper, libjpeg-turbo, libinput, libmng, libpng, libtiff, libwebp, libxkbcommon, Mesa, mtdev, pcre2, SQLite, Wayland, xcb-utilities

title: Build polkit 126
description: Authorization framework. Required by many system services.

title: Build nss-3.115
description: Network Security Services - required for QtWebEngine

title: Build nodejs-22.18.0
description: JavaScript runtime - required for QtWebEngine

title: Build lcms2 (Little CMS)
description: Color management library - required for libmng and Qt6

title: Build nspr-4.37
description: Netscape Portable Runtime - required by NSS

title: Build Phonon-backend-vlc-0.12.0
description: VLC backend for Phonon multimedia framework. Required: Phonon, VLC

title: Rebuild Shadow and systemd with PAM support
description: Shadow and systemd need to be rebuilt after Linux-PAM is installed to enable full PAM integration including systemd-logind and pam_systemd.so

title: Build libgcrypt 1.11.2
description: Cryptography library. Required by KDE Frameworks.

title: Tier 8: Plasma Prerequisites
description: breeze-icons, oxygen-icons, kirigami-addons, kio-extras

title: Build libmad-0.15.1b
description: MPEG audio decoder library - recommended for VLC

title: Build Boost-1.89.0
description: Boost C++ libraries - provides utility functions for Qt6/KDE. Recommended: which, Optional: ICU (already installed)

title: Tier 1: Post-LFS Security & Core Utilities
description: Linux-PAM, libpwquality, sudo, libgcrypt, polkit, etc. (~15 packages)
